verses.roman:
eta bali' jagadānande kailā āliṅgana
jagadānanda calilā prabhura vandiyā caraṇa

synonyms: eta bali'-saying this; jagadānande—to Jagadānanda Paṇḍita; kailā—did; āliṅgana—embracing; jagadānanda—Jagadānanda Paṇḍita; calilā—proceeded; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; vandiyā caraṇa—after worshiping the feet.
translation: After saying this, the Lord embraced Jagadānanda Paṇḍita, who then worshiped the Lord's lotus feet and started for Vṛndāvana.
